Html:
Hi, I saw that GMarkerGoogle has .Bearing, but has tried to set it to some values but the marker was not rotated, do I miss something?

GMarkerGoogle marker = new GMarkerGoogle(new PointLatLng(vhc.lat.Value, vhc.lon.Value), GMarkerGoogleType.red_dot);
marker.ToolTipMode = MarkerTooltipMode.Always;
marker.ToolTipText = vhc.name;
marker.Bearing = 90;                       
ovlVehicles.Markers.Add(marker);

bearing is fixed

p.s. marker rotation demo [left menu, Live->FlightRadar] and GMarkerArrow.cs
